# GWAShelpeR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of GWAShelpeR is to provide functions used in calculation of genetics at the genome-wide or candidate-gene level 

## Installation 

You can install t GWAShelpeR from this repository with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("holgerman/GWAShelpeR")
```
